meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>encourage</kanji> and the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to encourage someone</vocabulary> (or <vocabulary>to encourage</vocabulary>).
readingMnemonic: Think about encouraging a <reading>hag</reading> (はげ). She needs encouragement because she's a hag, and nobody likes her much because of that.
